posts.post_title: WTB - Graded Ames and/or Elberfeld, NY portrait.
posts.post_content: Hey guys I'm looking to buy an Ames and/or Elberfeld, NY graded portrait.  Graded 3 or higher please.  Can on or email to [url]kardboys@yahoo.com[/url].   Thanks, Bob I.
